import _objectSpread from"C:/Users/Lucas Araujo/Desktop/supabase/DeckMaster/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";// ÔøΩÔ∏è Remove tradu√ß√£o espec√≠fica do cache
export async function removeTranslation(cardId,cardName){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readwrite");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);const key="".concat(cardId,"_").concat(cardName);await store.delete(key);console.log("\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F Tradu\xE7\xE3o removida do cache: ".concat(cardName));return true;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao remover tradu√ß√£o:",error);return false;}}// ÔøΩüó£Ô∏è Cache de tradu√ß√µes no IndexedDB
// Evita chamadas repetidas √† Azure Translator API
const DB_NAME="deckmaster_translations";const DB_VERSION=1;const STORE_NAME="translations";// üìä Estat√≠sticas de cache
let stats={hits:0,misses:0,saves:0};// Inicializa o IndexedDB
function openDB(){return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const request=indexedDB.open(DB_NAME,DB_VERSION);request.onerror=()=>reject(request.error);request.onsuccess=()=>resolve(request.result);request.onupgradeneeded=event=>{const db=event.target.result;// Cria store se n√£o existir
if(!db.objectStoreNames.contains(STORE_NAME)){const store=db.createObjectStore(STORE_NAME,{keyPath:"key"});// √çndices para busca
store.createIndex("cardId","cardId",{unique:false});store.createIndex("timestamp","timestamp",{unique:false});console.log("‚úÖ Store de tradu√ß√µes criado");}};});}// üíæ Salva tradu√ß√£o no cache
export async function saveTranslation(cardId,cardName,translatedName,translatedText,faces){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readwrite");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);const cacheEntry={key:"".concat(cardId,"_").concat(cardName),// Chave √∫nica
cardId,cardName,translatedName,translatedText,faces:faces||null,// Array de faces traduzidas (se houver)
timestamp:Date.now()};await store.put(cacheEntry);stats.saves++;console.log("\uD83D\uDCBE Tradu\xE7\xE3o salva: ".concat(cardName," \u2192 ").concat(translatedName));return true;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao salvar tradu√ß√£o:",error);return false;}}// üîç Busca tradu√ß√£o no cache
export async function getTranslation(cardId,cardName){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readonly");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);const key="".concat(cardId,"_").concat(cardName);const result=await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const request=store.get(key);request.onsuccess=()=>resolve(request.result);request.onerror=()=>reject(request.error);});if(result){stats.hits++;console.log("\u2705 Cache HIT: ".concat(cardName));return result;}stats.misses++;console.log("\u274C Cache MISS: ".concat(cardName));return null;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao buscar tradu√ß√£o:",error);stats.misses++;return null;}}// üóëÔ∏è Remove tradu√ß√µes antigas (mais de 30 dias)
export async function cleanOldTranslations(){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readwrite");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);const index=store.index("timestamp");const thirtyDaysAgo=Date.now()-30*24*60*60*1000;const range=IDBKeyRange.upperBound(thirtyDaysAgo);let deleted=0;const cursorRequest=index.openCursor(range);return new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{cursorRequest.onsuccess=event=>{const cursor=event.target.result;if(cursor){cursor.delete();deleted++;cursor.continue();}else{console.log("\uD83E\uDDF9 ".concat(deleted," tradu\xE7\xF5es antigas removidas"));resolve(deleted);}};cursorRequest.onerror=()=>reject(cursorRequest.error);});}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao limpar tradu√ß√µes:",error);return 0;}}// üìä Obt√©m estat√≠sticas do cache
export function getStats(){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},stats),{},{hitRate:stats.hits+stats.misses>0?(stats.hits/(stats.hits+stats.misses)*100).toFixed(2)+'%':'0%'});}// üîÑ Reseta estat√≠sticas
export function resetStats(){stats={hits:0,misses:0,saves:0};}// üóëÔ∏è Limpa todo o cache (cuidado!)
export async function clearAllTranslations(){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readwrite");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);await store.clear();console.log("üóëÔ∏è Todas as tradu√ß√µes foram removidas");return true;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao limpar cache:",error);return false;}}// üìà Conta total de tradu√ß√µes no cache
export async function countTranslations(){try{const db=await openDB();const tx=db.transaction(STORE_NAME,"readonly");const store=tx.objectStore(STORE_NAME);const count=await new Promise((resolve,reject)=>{const request=store.count();request.onsuccess=()=>resolve(request.result);request.onerror=()=>reject(request.error);});return count;}catch(error){console.error("‚ùå Erro ao contar tradu√ß√µes:",error);return 0;}}// üåç Exp√µe no window para debug
if(typeof window!=='undefined'){window.translationCache={getStats,resetStats,clearAll:clearAllTranslations,count:countTranslations,clean:cleanOldTranslations};console.log("üó£Ô∏è Translation Cache dispon√≠vel em window.translationCache");}export default{saveTranslation,getTranslation,cleanOldTranslations,getStats,resetStats,clearAllTranslations,countTranslations};
